section.section: The Secretary shall appoint a Director of the Office of Cemetery Oversight with the approval of the Governor.
The Director serves at the pleasure of the Secretary.

text.section: The Director shall devote full time to the duties of the Office.

The Director is entitled to:
compensation in accordance with the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The Director shall:
administer and operate the Office; and
be responsible to the Secretary.
